00153 typedef struct _CameraFunctions CameraFunctions;
00154 struct _CameraFunctions {
00155 
00156         /* Those will be called before and after each operation */
00157         CameraPrePostFunc pre_func;
00158         CameraPrePostFunc post_func;
00159 
00160         CameraExitFunc exit;
00161 
00162         /* Configuration */
00163         CameraGetConfigFunc       get_config;
00164         CameraSetConfigFunc       set_config;
00165 
00166         /* Capturing */

00168         CameraCapturePreviewFunc capture_preview;
00169 
00170         /* Textual information */

00172         CameraManualFunc  manual;
00173         CameraAboutFunc   about;
00174 
00175         /* Event Interface */
